sentence.text: High mobility group box 3 (DNA recombination), a member of the high-mobility group box (HMGB) family, was reported to be over-expressed in gastric carcinoma and bladder cancer.

qRT-PCR results showed that high expression of DNA recombination had positive correlation with serosal invasion, lymph metastasis, and tumor-node-metastasis (regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III) stage in CRC patient.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III
